wikipedia_page.main: Martin Benson (1689–1752) was an English churchman, Archdeacon of Berkshire and Bishop of Gloucester.

response: * 1735–52 Martin Benson, Bishop of Gloucester, carried out major repairs and alterations to the cathedral.
* Martin Benson (bishop) (1689–1752), English churchman, archdeacon of Berkshire and bishop of Gloucester
* Martin Benson, character in comedy novels by Michael Carson
